name: Drop Dem Marbs (GMTK2020)
description:
A simple strategy game reminiscent of those circus/carnival games of old!

Test your marbleous guessing skills!

A GMTK2020 Submission

"Love's Marble's Lost" - Bill Shakespeare
"It doesn't have to make sense, it's Shakespeare." - Legit Gamer Weekly 

Art:
Alias Han Deforrest

Game Design:
Ger Gauss

Code:
Chris Jaroszko

Music:
Dakota St. Laurent
